summary: THIS IS A TRAILER DESIGNED FOR AND CARRIES TWO CARS.  BOTH FRAME RAILS HAVE DEVELOPED EXTENSIVE FRAME CRACKS JUST FORWARD AND AFT OF THE AXLES THAT MAY LEAD TO COLLAPSE.  THE TRAILER WALLS ARE NOT SUPPORTED OVER THE AXLES.  THE WALL LOAD IS CONCENTRATED ON THE FRAME SUPPORT RAILS IMMEDIATELY FORE AND AFT OF THE AXLES AND OVERLOAD THE FRAME THERE.  THE FRAME HAS SPLIT IS 7 LOCATIONS.    DIGITAL PHOTOS HAVE BEEN PROVIDED TO THE MANUFACTURER AND ARE AVAILABLE.  THE MANUFACTURER SAYS THE TRAILER IS OUT OF WARRANTY AND HAS NO FURTHER INTEREST IN THE FAILURE OF THEIR FRAME.*AK
